metadata.title: USN-6438-1 -- .NET vulnerabilities
metadata.description: Kevin Jones discovered that .NET did not properly process certain X.509 certificates. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service. (CVE-2023-36799)  It was discovered that the .NET Kestrel web server did not properly handle HTTP/2 requests. A remote attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service. (CVE-2023-44487)  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6438-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  dotnet-targeting-pack-6.0 - 6.0.123-0ubuntu1 aspnetcore-runtime-6.0 - 6.0.123-0ubuntu1 dotnet-hostfxr-6.0 - 6.0.123-0ubuntu1 dotnet-apphost-pack-6.0 - 6.0.123-0ubuntu1 dotnet-host - 6.0.123-0ubuntu1 dotnet-sdk-6.0-source-built-artifacts - 6.0.123-0ubuntu1 aspnetcore-targeting-pack-6.0 - 6.0.123-0ubuntu1 dotnet-sdk-6.0 - 6.0.123-0ubuntu1 dotnet6 - 6.0.123-0ubuntu1 dotnet-templates-6.0 - 6.0.123-0ubuntu1 netstandard-targeting-pack-2.1 - 6.0.123-0ubuntu1 dotnet-runtime-6.0 - 6.0.123-0ubuntu1 No subscription required  netstandard-targeting-pack-2.1-7.0 - 7.0.112-0ubuntu1 dotnet-hostfxr-7.0 - 7.0.112-0ubuntu1 dotnet-apphost-pack-7.0 - 7.0.112-0ubuntu1 aspnetcore-targeting-pack-7.0 - 7.0.112-0ubuntu1 aspnetcore-runtime-7.0 - 7.0.112-0ubuntu1 dotnet-templates-7.0 - 7.0.112-0ubuntu1 dotnet-targeting-pack-7.0 - 7.0.112-0ubuntu1 dotnet-sdk-7.0 - 7.0.112-0ubuntu1 dotnet7 - 7.0.112-0ubuntu1 dotnet-sdk-7.0-source-built-artifacts - 7.0.112-0ubuntu1 dotnet-runtime-7.0 - 7.0.112-0ubuntu1 dotnet-host-7.0 - 7.0.112-0ubuntu1 No subscription required
